welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Decatur, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and experience all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: Serves all domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serves all international flights coming into and out of the United States.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights at Gwinnett County Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
